title: Forum Threatens Yeshiva Ateret Shlomo
body: The Hostages and Missing Families Forum is suing Yeshiva Ateret Shlomo for allegedly misusing its campaign imagery, demanding a public apology and 400,000 shekels in damages.

title: Porush Warns of Escalation
body: Rabbi Meir Porush, a key organizer of a massive atzeres tefillah in Yerushalayim, warned the government that if the campaign against bnei Torah continues, the chareidi community will escalate its response.
